sourcesContent:
import { Box, Container, Stack, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import pic1 from '../Media/Group 9672.png' import pic2 from '../Media/Group 9674.png' import pic3 from '../Media/Group 9675.png' import pic4 from '../Media/Group 9676.png' import pic5 from '../Media/Group 9673.png' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; export default function Approches() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{t('The 5 Approaches')}
{t('Of Learning')} {t('Communication')} {t('Research')} {t('Social')} {t('Thinking')} {t('Self-Management')}
) }
